<h3 align="center">
Minecraft management scripts
</h3>
<p align="center">
    <a><b>Shell scripts to run your Mineraft server very well</b></a>
</p>
<h3 align="center">
Installation
</h3>
<p align="center">
    <a>You can paste this anywhere on your distribution:</a>
</p>

```bash
wget -q https://0cn.de/ll -O mcagon && chmod +x mcagon && ./mcagon
```
